articles.title: El Shafee Elsheikh, British ISIS member, sentenced for deadly kidnapping plot - CBS News
articles.description: El Shafee Elsheikh was found guilty of participating in a brutal ISIS hostage-taking scheme that led to the deaths of four Americans.
